channel.title: 1 Defence Range/Mage or Elvemage style?
channel.description:
I am so far at 20 range, and I was just wondering would it be better (pking wise) to go 1 def, High HP, range, mage, or those same stats but with 40 defence and go elvemage style? Either way i'm gonna use entangle & teleblock most likely. Right now i'm F2P (no need to be members at this low of level) but can go P2P when I get higher. I've had a level 80 and a level 90 before, and I have 2mil so far on my pure, but I can buy atleast another 10mil if I need it.
I used runehq and 40 def will raise my levels by about 10. Would it be worth it for the better defence/mage/range bonus? (if you've never seen elvemage I highly suggest you go watch his videos, if I go that way I will be using a similar loadout as his) Thanks :)

item.title: 1 Defence Range/Mage or Elvemage style?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:27, topic:399705”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=496827.msg3635579#msg3635579 date=1308583285]

low hp isn’t exactly the best.

it isn’t the worst either. you either drop or get dropped simple as that.
[/quote]

I made a 10hp pure a while back and just bandaged in soul wars, and ofc when I went pking it quickly wasn’t 10hp anymore but I just pjed/rushed and it was really good.[/quote]
yeah, same. 60 range 10 hp = 1 hit ko with dbow spec

Read full topic

Regardless of what you want the pure to become, it’s always best to keep it 1 def until maxed. You might want 44 prayer, though - could help.

item.title: 1 Defence Range/Mage or Elvemage style?
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

Yeah, could someone rate how this sounds from above?

(I like this idea the best, but I really want your guys opinions)
I could even do with 40 defence, take full black dhide, rune helmet, mystic body + legs, magic shortbow or some other means of ranging, and a DDS to special with, and super strength pot. (Combat level 83, that’s not to bad, and thats IF I go all the way to 99 atk, hp, str, mage, range)
Wear always mystic (or rune) boots, rune helm (possibly mystic hat when maging), black vambs, magic cape/ava’s accumulator, wear dhide when ranging, swap to mystic for magic (ancient magic), then DDS spec when their HP is low.
(I can also go the tank way from this later)

Read full topic

item.title: 1 Defence Range/Mage or Elvemage style?
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

Hard to keep a low HP while auto-botting on lumby cows…
Anyway, i’ve been thinking, should I go the way of the tank? I am seriously considering it. I think it would be funner, and you would get better drops in the wildy.
60/70 ATK (DDS, scim/whip (if 70))
99 STR
99 DEF (or 60 defence for only dragon armor, while keeping my combat level lower)
99 HP
99 RANGE
99 MAGE
1 PRAY

If I did 60 atk and def, my combat would be (if the rest were the same, but I probally won’t go for 99 everything, 85+) : 91
I think I could do good with 91 combat, wear rune/drag armor (exchange out for range or mage armor), DDS + Scim.
I could do a meele/range (melee armor + black dhide), range/mage (black dhide and mage armor).

OR

(I like this idea the best, but I really want your guys opinions)
I could even do with 40 defence, take full black dhide, rune helmet, mystic body + legs, and a DDS to special with, and super strength pot. (Combat level 83, that’s not to bad, and thats IF I go all the way to 99 atk, hp, str, mage, range)
Wear always mystic (or rune) boots, rune helm (possibly mystic hat when maging), black vambs, magic cape (maybe), wear dhide when ranging, swap to mystic for magic, then DDS spec when their HP is low.
(I can also go the tank way from this later)

The main advantage i’m thinking is that I will be able to train in a wider range of places, for now on F2P for a 1 defence it’s all cows…

Read full topic

item.title: 1 Defence Range/Mage or Elvemage style?
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

if you want to get range and mage up fast, be p2p…also do dung to get the sight.
go to range guild…you get about 52k/h rage xp, then get the rune arrows and alch…you get about 70k/h mage xp.
I’d say worth the $5

item.title: 1 Defence Range/Mage or Elvemage style?
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

Alright, should I go for high range first and then with only range do some pking in F2P? (with 60 range, and around 40 hp i will be level 40)

EDIT: Sorry if I sound stupid, but does this seem like an ok mid-level tank(or whatever you wanna call it)?
60 atk (dragon weapons)
80 str
40 def (for rune armor)
high 80-ish HP
high 80-90 range (bring magic shortbow)
85+ mage (teleblock + entangle?)
About level 80

Read full topic

item.title: 1 Defence Range/Mage or Elvemage style?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Have you ever PKed before? Also, the only effective pure in f2p is range-2h. I’d keep 1 def for a long time (at least until you max out mage/range).

Read full topic

item.title: 1 Defence Range/Mage or Elvemage style?
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

85 Mage (minimum)
Atleast 80 range
Whatever my hp is by then.

Also, on a side note, what about just 20 defence? Use the mystic armor + range legs & vambs, exchanging legs for mystic when i need to mage, and possibly some mithril for def (when ranging)? 20 def = 5 more combat levels.

Read full topic
